senses.sense_definition: A type of sandstone consisting of at least 25% feldspar grains, typically derived from the rapid disintegration of granite or gneiss.

examples.text: The geologist identified the reddish rock sample as <w>arkose</w> due to its high feldspar content.
Sedimentary layers of coarse <w>arkose</w> suggest that the material was deposited close to the source rock.
